name: Climb The Wall: Online Racing
description:
The wall, the final challenge of climbing, a huge concrete mole that extends as far as the eye can see, help Timy to get his dream and discover hidden mysteries, avoid the wall-keepers catching you, unlock new characters with amazing abilities and climb to the top.

Race online against players from around the world

But... hurry up, they never rest.

Features:
- Simple yet challenging mechanics, tap the next hold color
- Get characters with incredible skills,
- Challenge Mode, reach the target and unlock new characters!
- Multiplayer Mode, race online against the world to be the best.
- Customize your characters
- Upgrade your character, and climb higher
- Nice toon graphics.
- Multiple color configurations for colorblindness
- A different endless runner... A different hopper... Nah! just different.

A climbing game that will hook you, how high are you able to reach?
